Title: GNU Wget: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Wget, the worst of
    which could lead to the remote execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Wget. Please review the CVE identifier and bug reports referenced for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or obtain sensitive information.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All GNU Wget users should upgrade to the latest version:
